name: 咲耶
text: 私と関わる誰かに、笑顔になってもらいたい
trans: I want anyone who crosses my path to smile.

name: 咲耶
text:
そうすればきっと、たくさんの人と繋がれるから
寂しさを感じる暇なんてなくなるから
trans:
That way, I'll be connected to so many people,
and there won't be any time to feel lonely.

name: 咲耶
text: ────だから私は、望まれた姿の私でいたい
trans:
────That's why I want to be the me they
expected me to be.

name: 咲耶
text: ……でも
trans: ......And yet.

name: スタッフ１
text:
ああ、いいよいいよ
咲耶ちゃんとはタイプ違うし！
trans:
Nah, you don't have to.
They're not your type anyway!

name: スタッフ１
text:
咲耶ちゃんはクール系で、あのふたりはワイワイ系だもん
咲耶ちゃんがあっちに混ざってたらびっくりしちゃう
trans:
You're more the cool type, while they're the kind 
you'd see partying. You'd just freak them out if 
you actually tried hanging out with them.

name: スタッフ１
text: イメージとかもあるしねぇ
trans: You've gotta keep your image in mind too, you know.

name: ファン２
text: 絶対塩対応じゃん、咲耶様なんだから
trans:
God, she's gotta be like a total ice queen!
I mean, she's Sakuya-sama!

name: ファン１
trans: Yeah～

name: ファン１
text:
……でもそれはそれでイメージどおりで
あがらない？
trans: ...But like, isn't that exactly how you imagined her?

name: ファン２
text: まぁね
trans: Pretty much.

name: 咲耶
text: （──────たくさんの人と繋がりたい）
trans: (──────I want to connect with so many people.)

name: 咲耶
text: （…………今のままでは、それは……）
trans: (...But with things the way they are now...)

name: 咲耶
text: （……かといって簡単に辞めてしまうのも）
trans: (...It's not exactly easy to just quit.)

name: 咲耶
text:
（高校に入ってから今まで、
ずっとお仕事を頂いてきたのに…………──）
trans:
(I've been getting plenty of work ever since I
started high school too, so...──)

name: 咲耶
text: ………………お父さんとお母さんなら、どうする？
trans: ...Mom, Dad, what would you do?

name: 咲耶の父
text: ──お父さんはなぁ、すごく要領が悪くて
trans:
──Your old man here's not really good at much
of anything.

name: 咲耶
text: ……そうなの？
trans: ...Really?

name: 咲耶の父
text:
そうだよ、咲耶も見てたらわかるだろ？
お父さんが色々スマートじゃないの
trans:
Really. You've seen me in action, you know.
Dad's not exactly the brightest bulb when it 
comes to pretty much anything.

name: 咲耶
text: ……そうかなぁ……
trans: ...You sure...?

name: 咲耶の父
text: ははっ、咲耶は優しいなぁ
trans: Haha, you're too kind, Sakuya.

name: 咲耶の父
text: ……まぁ、だから
trans: ...Now, as I was saying.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
せめて、一度決めたことは
絶対にやり遂げようって思ってたんだ
trans:
At the very least, I figured I could see things
through once I'd set my mind to them.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
要領が悪い分を頑張りでカバーしよう！ ってことだな
……でも
trans:
Like "I'll make up for what I'm bad at through
hard work and effort!" and stuff.
...But then.

name: 咲耶の父
text: その頑張り方も要領が悪かった！
trans: Turns out I was bad at that too!

name: 咲耶の父
text:
ギリギリまで無理しようとしたことが何度かあって──
その時に、お母さんに止められたんだ
trans:
There were a few times I'd push myself
right to the brink──
And then Mom would be there to stop me.

name: 咲耶
text: お母さんに
trans: Mom?

name: 咲耶の父
text:
そう
お父さんはお母さんに救われたんだよ
trans:
Yup.
Mom saved your old man here.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
『キミが存外真面目で頑固なのはわかった
だからとっておきのおまじないを教えてあげよう』
trans:
"I know you're surprisingly serious, and stubborn
at that, so I've got some magic words here,
just for you."

name: 咲耶
text:
『決めたことはやり遂げると言うのなら──
やらない、と今決め直してしまえばいい』
trans:
"When you say you'll see something through
once you've set your mind on it──
You can always change your mind."

name: 咲耶
text:
『そうすれば、ほら
今からキミは大手を振って休むことができる』
trans:
"And then, would you look at that,
now you can rest easy."

name: 咲耶
text:
…………今この話を思い出すのは
自分に甘すぎる、かな……？
trans:
...Am I being too soft on myself,
reminiscing over this now...?

name: 咲耶
text: …………どうだろう……？
trans: ...I wonder...

name: 咲耶の父
text: うーん、咲耶にはまだわからないか……
trans: Hmm, you might not get it now, Sakuya...

name: 咲耶の父
text:
──でも、わかるようになった時こそ、
咲耶にこの言葉が必要なんだと思うから、覚えていてほしい
trans:
──But when you eventually do get it, 
I think these words are what you'll need to hear,
so I want you to remember them.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
咲耶はお父さんの子だから、
やると決めたら一直線になると思う
trans:
You're my daughter, Sakuya, so I know once you've
set your sights on something, you'll run straight
toward it.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
そして一度始めたら、責任感とか罪悪感で
『やめる』という選択肢が見えなくなることもあると思う
trans:
And once you start, you'll be so burdened by a
sense of responsibility and guilt that you'll never
realize quitting's a valid option too.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
……でも、いいんだよ
咲耶が真剣に考えて出した結論なら、やめたっていいんだ
trans:
...But, it's okay to.
If you've given it serious consideration, quitting
is a perfectly fine conclusion to come to.

name: 咲耶の父
text:
投げ出して無責任、じゃなくて
新しい一歩に責任を持ったって思っていい
trans:
I like to think of it as being responsible and taking a
new step forward, rather than being irresponsible
and throwing something away.

name: 咲耶の父
text: これは、お母さんがくれたおまじない
trans: Those are the magic words your mom gave me.

name: 咲耶
text:
（──今はまだ、
新しい一歩と言えるほどのきっかけはない）
trans:
(──I don't really have anything that'd make me
take that new step forward right now.)

name: 咲耶
text: （……でも、もし、そんなことがあったら）
trans: (...But, if I ever do...)

name: 咲耶
text: ……選んでも、いいのかな
trans: ...I wonder if I can make the choice?

name: 咲耶
text: ──また来るね
trans: ──I'll be back again.

name: プロデューサー
text: 君、アイドルになる気はないかい？
trans:
You there, do you have any interest in becoming
an idol?

name: プロデューサー
text: ぜひ君をアイドルとして、プロデュースしたいんだ！
trans: If you do, I'd love to be your producer!
